extractor-up.name: extractor-up
extractor-up.text: This is an extractor. It extracts object underneath it and bring it in the direction of the arrow

extractor-down.name: extractor-down
extractor-down.text: This is an extractor. It extracts object underneath it and bring it in the direction of the arrow

extractor-left.name: extractor-left

arrow-up.name: arrow-up
arrow-up.text: This is an item conveyor. It will bring an item in the direction of the arrow

arrow-down.name: arrow-down
arrow-down.text: This is an item conveyor. It will bring an item in the direction of the arrow

water.name: water
water.text: This is water. The chemical formula of water is H2O. Water is one of the most important stuff in nature, because all lifes requires water.

atp.name: atp
atp.text: This is ATP (Adenosine Tri-Phosphate), which is the most common energy source for living things.
